languages.text: "Кровью врагов причащусь, яростию веру напитаю и снова отправлюсь в бой — пожинать смерть неугодных".
"I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."
languages.original_text: "Кровью врагов причащусь, яростию веру напитаю и снова отправлюсь в бой — пожинать смерть неугодных".

traits.locale_text: "I shall drink of my enemies' blood, I shall feed my faith with rage, and then I shall return into battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."
"I shall drink of my enemies' blood, I shall feed my faith with rage, and then I shall return into battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."
"I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."
"I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."
"I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."

languages.text: «Beberé la sangre de mis enemigos, alimentaré mi fe con ira y, después, volveré a la batalla para segar las vidas de los indignos».
languages.original_text: "I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."

traits.locale_text: «Beberé la sangre de mis enemigos, alimentaré mi fe con ira y, después, volveré a la batalla para segar las vidas de los indignos».

languages.text: 「敵の血を飲み、この怒りを信仰の糧にします。そして戦闘に戻り、無価値なものの命を刈り取りましょう」
languages.original_text: "I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."

traits.locale_text: 「敵の血を飲み、この怒りを信仰の糧にします。そして戦闘に戻り、無価値なものの命を刈り取りましょう」

languages.text: “我要饱饮仇敌的鲜血，我要用愤怒滋养信仰。在这之后，我会回到战场，为那些毫无价值的人带来死亡。”
languages.original_text: "I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."

traits.locale_text: “我要饱饮仇敌的鲜血，我要用愤怒滋养信仰。在这之后，我会回到战场，为那些毫无价值的人带来死亡。”

languages.text: "Ich werde das Blut meiner Feinde trinken. Ich werde meinen Glauben durch Zorn nähren. Und dann werde ich wieder in die Schlacht ziehen, um die Leben der Unwürdigen zu ernten."
languages.original_text: "I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde das Blut meiner Feinde trinken. Ich werde meinen Glauben durch Zorn nähren. Und dann werde ich wieder in die Schlacht ziehen, um die Leben der Unwürdigen zu ernten."

languages.text: « Je m'abreuverai du sang de mes ennemis, je nourrirai ma foi de rage, puis je retournerai au combat pour récolter la mort des indignes. »
languages.original_text: "I shall drink of my enemies' blood; I shall feed my faith with rage; and then, I shall return to battle to reap the deaths of the unworthy."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'abreuverai du sang de mes ennemis, je nourrirai ma foi de rage, puis je retournerai au combat pour récolter la mort des indignes. »
